mapper.select: SELECT t.*, bi.* FROM tag_info t LEFT JOIN blog_tag bt ON t.tag_id = bt.tag_id LEFT JOIN blog_info bi ON bi.id = bt.blog_id

SELECT b.tag_id, b.tag_name, b.create_date, b.create_user, b.create_date, b.create_user, a.id, a.uid, a.title, a.content, a.introduction, a.click_rates, a.reply_amount, a.create_date AS create_date2, a.create_user AS create_user2, a.update_date AS update_date2, a.update_user AS update_user2, b2.tag_id AS tag_id2, b2.tag_name AS tag_name2 FROM blog_info AS a LEFT JOIN blog_tag AS bi ON a.id = bi.blog_id RIGHT JOIN tag_info AS b ON b.tag_id = bi.tag_id LEFT JOIN blog_tag AS bt2 ON a.id = bt2.blog_id LEFT JOIN tag_info AS b2 ON bt2.tag_id = b2.tag_id WHERE b.tag_id = #{id}
